name: part_012
file: tmp_【#不知火フレア3周年記念LIVE】大感謝祭！今日もバカみたいに騒ごう！【不知火フレア⧸ホロライブ】 [twAfWd7qSWQ]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_012.mov

scenes.description: Shiranui Flare performs 'Sky Sonar' live on stage.
Flare announces her 3rd anniversary commemorative goods, featuring items like a magazine rack and a hoodie.
Flare announces the premiere of the 'Fre-Fre-Elfriend' music video.
Flare shares a heartfelt message of gratitude to her fans, the 'Elfriends,' for their support over the past three years.

subtitles.original: 助けてと言えない　みんなそれぞれ　大変なんだし
subtitles.english: I can't say "help me" because everyone has their own struggles.

subtitles.original: でも笑顔になれる　世界がすぐそばにあるじゃん！
subtitles.english: But a world where you can smile is right there by your side!

subtitles.original: 気づいてワンクリック
subtitles.english: Notice it with one click.

subtitles.original: 扉はひらく
subtitles.english: The door opens.

subtitles.original: 優しい顔してる　幸せばかりじゃない
subtitles.english: You have a kind face; it's not all about happiness.

subtitles.original: 険しい道にも　かわいい花が咲いている
subtitles.english: Even on steep paths, cute flowers are blooming.

subtitles.original: 何度でも描いて　自惚れちゃう自画像
subtitles.english: Draw it as many times as you like, a self-portrait you'll fall in love with.

subtitles.original: 青空みたいな画用紙　広げて待ってる
subtitles.english: Drawing paper like a blue sky, I'm waiting with it spread out.

subtitles.original: 夢より夢みたいな未来で
subtitles.english: In a future even more dreamlike than a dream,

subtitles.original: 会いたい
subtitles.english: I want to see you.

subtitles.original: かなしみは　よろこびに混ぜ合わせて
subtitles.english: Mixing sadness together with joy,

subtitles.original: くるしみは　しあわせに解け合いたい
subtitles.english: I want suffering to melt away into happiness.

subtitles.original: 好きな色に生まれ変わるために
subtitles.english: To be reborn in the colors I like.

subtitles.original: どこにもないものは　誰もまだ知らないだけ
subtitles.english: What can't be found anywhere is just something no one knows yet.

subtitles.original: 形も名前も　自由に掲げていいんだ
subtitles.english: You can freely display its shape and name.

subtitles.original: もう一度描いて　あなたの好きなように
subtitles.english: Draw it once more, just the way you like.

subtitles.original: 青空みたいな画用紙　広げて待ってる
subtitles.english: Drawing paper like a blue sky, I'm waiting with it spread out.

subtitles.original: 夢より夢みたいな未来を
subtitles.english: A future even more dreamlike than a dream,

subtitles.original: 進め
subtitles.english: Move forward.

subtitles.original: みんな、今日のライブはどうだった？
subtitles.english: Everyone, how was today's live?

subtitles.original: 不知火フレア活動３周年記念グッズのお知らせだよ。
subtitles.english: Here's an announcement for Shiranui Flare's 3rd anniversary goods.

subtitles.original: lack父さん描き下ろしのマガジンラックに、３周年にしてついに出しちゃう、エルフレンド証明書に、
subtitles.english: A magazine rack illustrated by Lack-papa, and finally, for my 3rd anniversary, an Elfriend Certificate!

subtitles.original: そして証明書も入れれちゃうおしゃれでかわいいIDカードケース。
subtitles.english: And a stylish and cute ID card case that can even hold the certificate.

subtitles.original: そしてグッズの最後はこいつはすごい！エルフレンドと私をイメージしたパーカーも出しちゃうぞ。
subtitles.english: And the last item is amazing! A hoodie designed with the image of Elfriends and myself.

subtitles.original: エルフレらしさだけじゃなくて、私らしさも入れちゃった。
subtitles.english: I put not just Elfriend-style, but also my own style into it.

subtitles.original: さらに気になる全部特典についてだよ。
subtitles.english: Furthermore, here's information about the full set benefit.

subtitles.original: ３周年記念グッズをフルセットで購入してくれた方には特典で、
subtitles.english: For those who purchase the full set of 3rd anniversary goods, as a bonus,

subtitles.original: 不知火フレア直筆サイン＆箔押し複製メッセージ入り、lack先生描き下ろしポストカードが付いてくるよ。今回はなんと購入者全員に愛を込めて届けるから喧嘩しないでね。
subtitles.english: you'll get a postcard illustrated by Lack-sensei, featuring my autograph and a foil-stamped message. This time, it'll be delivered to everyone who buys it with love, so please don't fight!

subtitles.original: そしてそして！今日の全曲オリ曲ライブの中から一曲、
subtitles.english: And also! One song from today's all-original-song live,

subtitles.original: 大好きなエルフレンドをテーマにした、「フレ・フレ・エルフレ」のMVをこの後22時10分からプレミア公開するよ。
subtitles.english: the MV for "Fre-Fre-Elfriend", themed after my beloved Elfriends, will premiere at 22:10!

subtitles.original: 楽曲は0時からリリースされるからね。
subtitles.english: The song will be released at midnight.

subtitles.original: みんなに元気届けるからね。
subtitles.english: I'll deliver energy to everyone.

subtitles.original: 私が3年頑張ってこれたのは、みんながいたからだよ。
subtitles.english: The reason I've been able to work hard for three years is because you were all here.

subtitles.original: いつもありがとう。
subtitles.english: Thank you as always.

subtitles.original: 私から君への感謝の気持ち、ちゃんと届いてたら嬉しいな。
subtitles.english: I hope my feelings of gratitude toward you reach you properly.

subtitles.original: いつもありがとうだよ。
subtitles.english: Thank you always.

subtitles.original: 大好きだぞ。
subtitles.english: I love you all.

subtitles.original: I love you.
subtitles.english: I love you.
